The Artemis Initiative is a joint effort of eBroselow and the Pediatric Pharmacy Advocacy Group to develop an international standard for pediatric dosage. The Artemis emergency pediatric care software provides healthcare practitioners with critical, size-specific therapeutic information in seconds so that they can deliver prompt, competent and confident emergency care. Artemis is a web-based enterprise-level application suitable for hospitals, urgent care and EMS. For further information, visit eBroselow.com.
